name: Raven Stone
description:
Play as a mysterious little thief in search of treasures. 
Make your way through a dark dungeon while avoiding guards and traps in order to steal the relic they are watching over : the Raven Stone == CREDITS ==

This game is a prototype developped at Ynov Bordeaux by :

  • Valentin Viguier, Project Manager, AI Programmer (valentinviguier@orange.fr)
  • Alexandre Duviviers, Lead Game Programmer (duviviersalex@hotmail.fr)
  • Robin Cherpitel, Gameplay Programmer (robincherpitel@gmail.com)
  • Antoine Combes, Lead Game Designer (cmbs.antoine@gmail.com)
  • Emmanelle Aurela, Lead Artist, Character Designer/Modeler, Animator, FX Artist (emmanuelleaurla.artstation.com - emmanuelle.aurela@gmail.com)
  • Romain Oltra (Imanor), Props Modeler, Environment Artist, Lighting Artist (artstation.com/imanor - romain.oltra@gmail.com)

Special thanks :

  • Thomas Veauclin, Art Director at BIG BAD WOLF
  • Fabrice Granger, Technical Director at BIG BAD WOLF
  • Thierry Bourra, Code, Tech & Legal at AWACEB
  • Philippe Crifo, Story, Art & Design at AWACEB

DISCLAIMER :

ZQSD is the AZERTY equivalent of WASD. You unfortunately cannot rebind the controls yet but what you can do is change your windows keyboard layout to AZERTY (french). Sorry for the inconvenience.

Game is best played using a controller.
